entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:07 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 4:10 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: E 18 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
